achievements.name: The Journey Begins
achievements.description: Choose your starter Pokemon

achievements.name: First Steps
achievements.description: Begin your Pokemon journey

achievements.name: Research Assistant
achievements.description: Receive the Pokedex from Professor Oak

achievements.name: Special Delivery
achievements.description: Deliver Oak's Parcel to Professor Oak

achievements.name: Tower Hero
achievements.description: Rescue Mr. Fuji from Team Rocket at Pokemon Tower

achievements.name: Corporate Savior
achievements.description: Defeat Giovanni and save Silph Co

achievements.name: Cutting Edge
achievements.description: Obtain HM01 Cut from the Captain on the S.S. Anne

achievements.name: Wings of Freedom
achievements.description: Obtain HM02 Fly from the Route 16 gatekeeper

achievements.name: Surfer Dude
achievements.description: Obtain HM03 Surf from the Secret House in Safari Zone

achievements.name: Strong Foundation
achievements.description: Obtain HM04 Strength from the Safari Zone warden

achievements.name: Junior Researcher
achievements.description: Register 10 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Collector
achievements.description: Register 25 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokemon Enthusiast
achievements.description: Register 50 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokedex Master
achievements.description: Register 100 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Kanto Completionist
achievements.description: Complete the Kanto Pokedex (151 Pokemon)

achievements.name: Boulder Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Brock and earn the Boulder Badge

achievements.name: Cascade Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Misty and earn the Cascade Badge

achievements.name: Thunder Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Lt. Surge and earn the Thunder Badge

achievements.name: Rainbow Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Erika and earn the Rainbow Badge

achievements.name: Soul Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Koga and earn the Soul Badge

achievements.name: Marsh Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Sabrina and earn the Marsh Badge

achievements.name: Volcano Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Blaine and earn the Volcano Badge

achievements.name: Earth Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Giovanni and earn the Earth Badge

achievements.name: Gym Leader Conqueror
achievements.description: Defeat all 8 Gym Leaders

achievements.name: Elite Four: Lorelei
achievements.description: Defeat Lorelei of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four: Bruno
achievements.description: Defeat Bruno of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four: Agatha
achievements.description: Defeat Agatha of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four: Lance
achievements.description: Defeat Lance of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four Vanquisher
achievements.description: Defeat all members of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Champion Slayer: Blue
achievements.description: Defeat Champion Blue

achievements.name: Legendary Caught: Mewtwo
achievements.description: Catch the legendary Pokemon Mewtwo

achievements.name: Legendary Caught: Moltres
achievements.description: Catch the legendary Pokemon Moltres

achievements.name: Legendary Caught: Zapdos
achievements.description: Catch the legendary Pokemon Zapdos

achievements.name: Legendary Caught: Articuno
achievements.description: Catch the legendary Pokemon Articuno

achievements.name: Winged Legends
achievements.description: Catch Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres

achievements.name: Legendary Master
achievements.description: Catch all legendary Pokemon in the game

achievements.name: Pokemon Master
achievements.description: All badges, Champion defeated, and complete Kanto Pokedex
